mc.name: Chandra Nalaar
mc.oracleText:
+1: Chandra Nalaar deals 1 damage to target player.
-X: Chandra Nalaar deals X damage to target creature.
-8: Chandra Nalaar deals 10 damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.
mc.printedText:
+1: Chandra Nalaar deals 1 damage to target player.
-X: Chandra Nalaar deals X damage to target creature.
-8: Chandra Nalaar deals 10 damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.

mc.name: Jace Beleren
mc.oracleText:
+2: Each player draws a card.
-1: Target player draws a card.
-10: Target player puts the top twenty cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
mc.printedText:
+2: Each player draws a card.
-1: Target player draws a card.
-10: Target player puts the top twenty cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

mc.name: Seal of Fire
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Seal of Fire: Seal of Fire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Seal of Fire: Seal of Fire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: After the fourth time Chandra left a place engulfed in flames, she decided to just go ahead and make it her thing.

mc.name: Incinerate
mc.oracleText: Incinerate deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
mc.printedText: Incinerate deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
mc.flavorText: "Who said there are no assurances in life? I assure you this is going to hurt."

mc.name: Fact or Fiction
mc.oracleText: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
mc.printedText: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
mc.flavorText: "Try to pretend like you understand what's important."

mc.name: Counterspell
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell.
mc.flavorText: The pyromancer summoned up her mightiest onslaught of fire and rage. Jace feigned interest.

mc.name: Aethersnipe
mc.oracleText:
When Aethersnipe enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Evoke {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
mc.printedText:
When Aethersnipe comes into play, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Evoke {1}{U}{U} (You may play this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it comes into play.)

mc.name: Flamekin Brawler
mc.oracleText: {R}: Flamekin Brawler gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {R}: Flamekin Brawler gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: When he hits people, they stay hit.

mc.name: Guile
mc.oracleText:
Guile can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
If a spell or ability you control would counter a spell, instead exile that spell and you may play that card without paying its mana cost.
When Guile is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.
mc.printedText:
Guile can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
If a spell or ability you control would counter a spell, instead remove that spell from the game and you may play that card without paying its mana cost.
When Guile is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

mc.name: Hostility
mc.oracleText:
Haste
If a spell you control would deal damage to an opponent, prevent that damage. Put a 3/1 red Elemental Shaman creature token with haste onto the battlefield for each 1 damage prevented this way.
When Hostility is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.
mc.printedText:
Haste
If a spell you control would deal damage to an opponent, prevent that damage. Put a 3/1 red Elemental Shaman creature token with haste into play for each 1 damage prevented this way.
When Hostility is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

mc.name: Ingot Chewer
mc.oracleText:
When Ingot Chewer enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
Evoke {R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
mc.printedText:
When Ingot Chewer comes into play, destroy target artifact.
Evoke {R} (You may play this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it comes into play.)
mc.flavorText: Elementals are ideas given form. This one is the idea of "smashitude."

mc.name: Soulbright Flamekin
mc.oracleText: {2}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, you may add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {2}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, you may add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: When provoked, a flamekin's inner fire burns far hotter than any giant's forge.

mc.name: Fireslinger
mc.oracleText: {T}: Fireslinger deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you.
mc.printedText: {T}: Fireslinger deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you.
mc.flavorText:
"Remember the moral of the fireslinger fable: with power comes isolation."
--Karn, silver golem

mc.name: Flame Javelin
mc.oracleText:
({2R} can be paid with any two mana or with {R}. This card's converted mana cost is 6.)
Flame Javelin deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
({2R} can be paid with any two mana or with {R}. This card's converted mana cost is 6.)
Flame Javelin deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: Gyara Spearhurler would have been renowned for her deadly accuracy, if it weren't for her deadly accuracy.

mc.name: Pyre Charger
mc.oracleText:
Haste
{R}: Pyre Charger gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Haste
{R}: Pyre Charger gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: His blade was forged over coals of moaning treefolk, curved at the optimum angle for severing heads, and heated to volcanic temperatures by his touch.

mc.name: Slith Firewalker
mc.oracleText:
Haste
Whenever Slith Firewalker deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
mc.printedText:
Haste
Whenever Slith Firewalker deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
mc.flavorText: The slith incubate in the Great Furnace's heat, emerging on Mirrodin's surface only when the four suns have aligned overhead.

mc.name: Air Elemental
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: Pray that it doesn't seek the safety of your lungs.

mc.name: Bottle Gnomes
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.
mc.flavorText: Reinforcements . . . or refreshments?

mc.name: Cone of Flame
mc.oracleText: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to target creature or player, 2 damage to another target creature or player, and 3 damage to a third target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to target creature or player, 2 damage to another target creature or player, and 3 damage to a third target creature or player.

mc.name: Flamewave Invoker
mc.oracleText: {7}{R}: Flamewave Invoker deals 5 damage to target player.
mc.printedText: {7}{R}: Flamewave Invoker deals 5 damage to target player.
mc.flavorText: Inside even the humblest goblin lurks the potential for far greater things--and far worse.

mc.name: Furnace Whelp
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Baby dragons can't figure out humans--if they didn't want to be killed, why were they made of meat and treasure?

--Jhoira, master artificer

mc.name: Fireball
mc.oracleText:
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players.
Fireball costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
mc.printedText:
As an additional cost to play Fireball, pay {1} for each target beyond the first.
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players.
mc.flavorText: The spell fell upon the crowd like a dragon, ancient and full of death.

mc.name: Oxidda Golem
mc.oracleText:
Affinity for Mountains (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Mountain you control.)
Haste
mc.printedText:
Affinity for Mountains (This spell costs {1} less to play for each Mountain you control.)
Haste
mc.flavorText: The longer it patrols the smoldering crags of the Oxidda Chain, the more it adopts their fiery temper.

mc.name: Spire Golem
mc.oracleText:
Affinity for Islands (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Island you control.)
Flying
mc.printedText:
Affinity for Islands (This spell costs {1} less to play for each Island you control.)
Flying
mc.flavorText: The longer it soars above the shimmering swirls of the Quicksilver Sea, the more it adopts their unpredictability.

mc.name: Flametongue Kavu
